known_issues: Black screen issue - content not visible except pink heart icon, text only visible when highlighted

existing_features.title: Diagnose and fix the black screen issue where the entire page background is black, making content invisible except for a pink heart icon at the bottom
Ensure text content is visible by default without requiring mouse drag selection to reveal it
Verify the pink heart icon at the bottom is styled correctly and check if it should be visible or if it's an unintended element
